lesson.title: Observability in Distributed Systems
lesson.summary: Comprehensive monitoring and logging provide visibility into system health, performance, and behavior for troubleshooting and optimization.
lesson.real_world_example: Google's SRE practices use SLIs, SLOs, and error budgets to maintain 99.99% uptime across their services
lesson.mermaid_diagram:
graph TD
    App[Application] --> Metrics[Metrics Collector]
    App --> Logs[Log Aggregator]
    App --> Traces[Distributed Tracing]
    Metrics --> Dashboard[Monitoring Dashboard]
    Logs --> Search[Log Search]
    Traces --> Analysis[Performance Analysis]
